name: analyze_metadata_generic_tool
description: Specialized tool for extracting generic metadata from document images. ONLY use for: documents requiring metadata extraction, bibliographic information extraction, document classification, archival processing, and general document metadata analysis. NOT for: content analysis, text extraction, diagrams, or tables. If no metadata-relevant content is found, returns that no metadata was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials

result.description: Analysis result from Metadata Generic Analyzer
